formulas.name: errorMessageNew
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!$Flow.FaultMessage}, 'Password') && CONTAINS({!$Flow.FaultMessage}, 'Username'),'Confirm Password does not match and also check Username !' , IF(CONTAINS({!$Flow.FaultMessage}, 'Username'), 'Username is already exist !', IF(CONTAINS({!$Flow.FaultMessage}, 'Password'), 'Confirm Password does not match !', ' ')))

fields.fieldText: Your Account is created Successfully !

fields.fieldText: Your Successfully Applied For {!posTable.firstSelectedRow.Name} !

fields.fieldText: Your Account is Updated Successfully !

fields.fieldText: ﻿Select Positions And Apply Here

fields.name: alreadyApplyLabel
fields.fieldText: You Already Applied For This Job Positions

fields.fieldText:
Sorry you have wrong input

fields.fieldText: ﻿We make careers, not just jobs
